server.controller

Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.controller.LobbyCtrl

  • public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
    Lobby(roomCtrl) where users have to join/create a roomCtrl to play in

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void addSocketListener(server.network.SocketListener socketListener)
      Includes a new socketListener (user) in Lobby Room Every socketListener is a connected user looking forward to join a roomCtrl
